Jekyll Dark Clean Theme 23 Aug 2014

Introduction

Here is a sample post for Jekyll-Clean-Dark theme.

  • Get it from github.
  • See the live demo.
  • See it in action on my blog.

This theme was created on top of Jekyll Clean theme by Scotte.

This theme uses some parts of Twitter Bootstrap, which allows it looks nice on a mobile devices using a collapsable nav bar and hiding the sidebar.

Here how it looks like on iPhone 5:

And on iPad mini:

Optionally you can use:

  • Disqus as a comments system;
  • Google Analyticse;
  • Yandex Metrika;
  • Blog tags.

Also you can have social icons which could lead to your social acounts. Out-of-the box it has:

You can easily add more by putting svg images in a /css/social folder and adding css styles for them.

All these features could be set up in _config.yml.

Installation

If you dont't have your own blog you can clone this repository and put your articles in a _posts folder. If you already have your own blog then I think you can clone this repository and copy-paste content keeping your _posts folder.

After you will have to set up your _config.yml
